questions.text: In retaliation for the 1599 Acoma Revolt, Governor Juan de OÃ±ate ordered

answers.text: the complete destruction of Acoma Pueblo, including its buildings and people.
the imprisonment of a few key leaders of the revolt.
the mutilation of all Acoma men over the age of twenty-five.
that no actions be taken for fear of further infuriating Pueblo peoples.

questions.text: During the final push for New Mexico's statehood, officials in the U.S. Senate proposed a measure called jointure that would have

answers.text: created a joint state out of New Mexico, Arizona, and Oklahoma territories.
combined New Mexico and Arizona into one large state called 'Montezuma.'
divided New Mexico into two smaller states.
prevented New Mexico's statehood for another decade.
